divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up around 3-3:30 &started to get up to go to the bathroom& I laid back down when i saw something flying very low and slowly outside across the street over the neighboring houses. I tried to wake up my husband and he would not get up. This thing looked like it flew even lower and was coming down the street towards towards my house. I was too scared to get up so I layed there and hoped it was gone. It had to be close because light filtered into my room. At first I thought it was a helicopter but there was no noise and it was way to bright with a bluish light. I fell asleep right after that I think and then I woke up again at about 4:30 and things seemed normal so I went to the bathroom. What was it? Anyone else see it?
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pittston
There was one other sighting in Pittston on or around January 1st 2009
Summary: i woke up and saw a large,extremely bright flying object through my bedroom window.
